author: remm
msg: - None of the users have the password property set, so logging in is disabled
- Add a commented out example on how to set the password property for

author: remm
msg: - Will now refuse to authenticate a user if there is no password property on the
user object in the Slide namespace.
- The password property now belongs to the Slide namespace.

author: msmith
msg: Return specific status codes for non-collection COPY or MOVE. Currently,
we always use a 207 multistatus. This works, but isn't sensible, and can
cause problems for some people. (basically the same change as for DELETE

author: remm
msg: - Is isConnected() throws a ServiceAccessException, the exception will be
ignored, and a reconnection attempt will be made.

author: remm
msg: - Fix a serious bug when deleting or copying links, where the link target would
get deleted or copied (which obviously is incorrect).
Bug reported by Matthew Stone <matt.stone at jcafeinc.com>
